name: Hover Cube
description:
A game for#flappyjam. I wanted to make a Flappy Bird game that was 2 player; a verses mode. Yet, adding a single player mode was too appealing. In the vein of simplicity, there is no built in high-score. It may come later though. In the mean time, feel free to post your high score on the Internet! (Screenshots encouraged)

Inspired by Flappy Bird and 140 (http://game140.com/)

Game 32 of 100 in 5 years
